header_text: You arrive to a morning meeting exactly on time, but you are the last one to arrive. Your coworkers look at you as you pull out your chair, and it squeaks loudly. They all turn to look at you with a slight frown.

elements.text: In the end, you realize that your coworkers are just good employees who were enthusiastic to get the meeting started. They responded to you during the rest of the meeting quite...
